title: Flipkart Search Traffic Report Daily Report
description: Daily report for search traffic on Flipkart for a specific product

Listing_Id.description: Unique identifier for the product listing on Flipkart

SKU_Id.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) identifier for the product

Product_Title.description: Title or name of the product

Category.description: Category of the product on Flipkart, e.g., 'CookingAndCookware'

Impression_Date.description: Date when the impressions were recorded in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'

Product_Views.description: Number of views or impressions of the product

Product_Clicks.description: Number of clicks on the product

Units_Sold.description: Number of units of the product sold

Average_Selling_Price.description: Details of the average selling price

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'
